page.title: 09Religion & Churches.
page.content: The four churches in the Dowlish Wake area are all Church of England, there are no other places of worship. The churches are all united to form one benefice with the incumbent living in Dowlish Wake. Dowlish Wake church - St. Andrew, consists of a nave, tower and chancel. Some 14th Century work but much restored in 1860. Memorials to the Speke family. Kingstone church - St. Mary, consists of a nave, tower and chancel. 16th C chalice and cover. Chillington church - St James, small perpendicular church with chancel,nave,north vestry, and bell cote. Victorian south transept. 16th C chalice and cover. Cricket Malherbie church- St. Mary Magdalene, built 1855.
